sn35.166:4.3: “kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, jānato kathaṃ passato sakkāyadiṭṭhi pahīyatī”ti?
sn35.166:4.4: “Cakkhuṃ kho, bhikkhu, dukkhato jānato passato sakkāyadiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.166:4.5: Rūpe dukkhato jānato passato sakkāyadiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.166:4.6: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dukkhato jānato passato sakkāyadiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.166:4.7: Cakkhusamphassaṃ dukkhato jānato passato sakkāyadiṭṭhi pahīyati … pe …
sn35.166:4.8: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhato jānato passato sakkāyadiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.166:4.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṃ passato sakkāyadiṭṭhi pahīyatī”ti.
